lead_paragraph: Becky Hammon scored 35 points, including four free throws in the final 36 seconds, as the San Antonio Silver Stars advanced to their first W.N.B.A. finals with a 76-72 victory over the visiting Los Angeles Sparks in Game 3 of the Western Conference finals.
